participant_1.background:
I don't have time for Comic Con, but I do have time to volunteer at my local animal shelter.
I used to enjoy playing sports, but my back pain has made it too difficult.
in my spare time i like to play video games.
i earn passive income that no one knows about.
I love eating at the local sports bar with my son after his games.

participant_2.background:
I want to learn how to protect my children from harm.
I have a dog named Snowball who keeps me company when I'm recovering from my knee surgery.
i have a marketing job.
i try to eat healthy or i do not eat at all.
i want to be a music teacher.

content.text: Hi, how are you?
Hello! I am doing okay, how are you?
I am doing great! I'm glad to hear that you are doing okay.
Thanks! I'm recovering from knee surgery.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that! I hope you have a speedy recovery.
Thank you! I have a dog named Snowball who is keeping me company.
Aww, that's nice! I love dogs.
I'm glad! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play video games, volunteer at the animal shelter, and eat at the local sports bar with my son after his games.
Oh, that sounds like a lot of fun! I used to enjoy playing sports, but my back pain has made it too difficult.
I'm sorry to hear that! I hope your back pain gets better soon.
Thanks! I appreciate it.
I also volunteer at the animal shelter, but I don't have any kids.
That's great! I love animals. I'm glad that you're able to help out.
Thanks! I'm glad that I'm able to help out too.
What's your favorite kind of video game to play?
I like to play all sorts of video games, but my favorite kind is action-adventure games.
Oh, I like those too! I love playing games where I can explore and solve puzzles.
Me too! I think it's so much fun to get lost in a game and forget about everything else.
I agree! I love being able to escape from the real world for a little while.
Me too! It's so relaxing.
I'm glad that you feel the same way!
Me too
